Topic.Title: Programm keeps telling me that a new version is available

Posts.EditableText:
Hi. Today I downloaded the newest version of Quest 5.7.2 (quest572.exe).
I installed it and opened it and at the bottom of the screen there is a big yellow bar and a green text telling me:

New version available
Quest 5.7.2
Click here to update

When I click the button, it links me to the same page that I just downloaded the game before.  Even after installing Quest again, a second time, it keeps telling that a newer version is available. Is this normal? What can I do to solve this error?

greetings, Enroth

Posts.EditableText: I think that’s a known bugaboo.  If I’m not mistaken, it sounds like you have the most current version.  I think you are good to go.
Posts.HTML: I think that’s a known bugaboo. If I’m not mistaken, it sounds like you have the most current version. I think you are good to go.

Yeah, don't worry about it. It's like Xan said.
The same thing happens to me every time I open quest and it has been since I downloaded it.
